Title: Globetrotters
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Adam Armus, Lacey Marisa Friedman (executive story editor), Lauren Bans (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: When Adam attends a Globetrotters game, he falls in love with the "theatrics" of the team and tries doing his own tricks on the court. But when he cuts together a video that makes Barry ...
